Советую данную игру. графика не очень, а так можно играть.

Lots of fun! You just have to ignore the 12 year olds who act immature (not saying all of them are like that) playing and not let them get to you. It's not worth it, you can't reason with them. If you can handle all that, you'll have a great time playing this game. However, my biggest complaint with this game is there are no offline deathmatches with AI bots. You only get one life in the offline battles and you have to wait until the round is all over and there and all attempts of me finding a mod that lets you do play a deathmatch similiar to Goldeneye 007 or Unreal Tournament have failed. There are even these kinds of deathmatches online, but the people playing online are too good for beginners and it isn't fair for those trying the game out for the first time. It's still a big improvement over the original game in terms of graphics, but nowhere near as good as Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. 

FINAL RATING: 85 out of 100

This is a great game. It's getting pretty old now and cs:go is much better, but the gun game on here is still my fav. Would buy again, worth getting on sale if you have a crapy system and can't run cs:go. $20 seems steap when you can get GO for $15, but will suck you right in and you will have countless hour of fun. 5 years later and I still play on occasion.

Да, я рекоминдую купиь Counter-Strike: Source, но я вам советую купить за 499 руб. Купить Counter-Strike Complete. Это чуть ниже Counter-Strike: Source и там покупаешь не только Counter-Strike: Source, но и :Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Counter-Strike: Source, Counter-Strike, Counter-Strike: Condition Zero:. Из четырёх покупок я буду играть только в, Counter-Strike: Source и Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. Выгода в том что можно купить две игры сначало Source, а потом Global Offensive и потратить на это почти 1000!! РУБ. а можно просто взять и купить 4-ре Counter-Strike всего за 499 руб!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Вообщем я советую куписть Counter-Strike!

Its as good as the original, just with some few changes aside from maps. Such as if get blown but survived by a grenade it made you temporary deaf which makes it harder to hear enemies. Theres more changes and its pretty good comparing the original, but the original is still good as it is.

Edit: Even though this is almost the same as CS 1.6, there are some additional mods in this you dont normally see on CS 1.6. That is, if you are interested in it.

There are also some slight changes on some guns. The machine gun shoots a bit faster, auto shotgun reloads like pump shotgun, and there are some mods that you can play more than 32 players.

Its pretty good, I would suggest picking it up if you want. Though it should be noted its less like CS GO, but more like CS 1.6.

Again, but with changes.
